Authors: Ullberg, J; Johnson, P; Buschle, M
Book Editors: VanSinderen, M; Johnson, P
Author Full Names: Ullberg, Johan; Johnson, Pontus; Buschle, Markus
Article Title: A Modeling Language for Interoperability Assessments
Source Title: ENTERPRISE INTEROPERABILITY
Book Series Title: Lecture Notes in Business Information Processing
Conference Title: 3rd International IFIP Working Conference on Enterprise Interoperability
Conference Sponsor: IFIP TC5 WG5 8,INTEROP VLab,KTH, Royal Inst Technol,Ctr Telemat & Informat Technol
Author Keywords: Interoperability; Modeling Language; Interoperability Assessment
Abstract: Decision-making on issues related to interoperability can be furthered by the use of models of the organization or information system where interoperability is of concern. In order to provide decision-making support, the models should be amenable to analyses. This paper presents a modeling language specifically for interoperability issues where interoperability is defined as the probability that two more actors will be able to exchange information and use that information. The language is coupled with a probabilistic mechanism for automated interoperability assessments of the models created. The paper also presents an example of how the language can be applied.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Researching of Chinese University's Tuition Standard Based on Urban-rural Income Differences
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Higher Education Tuition Fees; Tuition and Fees for Each Student; Mathematical Model; Income Differences
Abstract: This article investigated the correlative factor of affecting the higher education tuition fees and the interrelation of them. On the premise of reasonable assumptions and real and effective related data, the best tuition model of China higher education has been analyzed which based on the difference between urban and rural income levels. Expenses standard with rural and urban income level has been established, and then the rationality of tuition fees for previous years has been judged, we got a dynamic model about the formulation of school fees. At last, it pointed out the necessity of collecting tuition fees according to the urban-rural income differences.

Article Title: The Application of BP-Neural Networks to the Interpolation of Missing Hydrological Data
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: BP-Neural Networks; Interpolation of missing data; The elevation of hydrologic station
Abstract: The elevation of hydrologic station is the key point of hydrological analysis. This paper will adopt BP-Neural Networks to set up a model of interpolation about the missing elevation data of hydrologic station. The data set of hydrologic station is about drainage area in the middle and lower reaches of Yellow river, or in some branches of Yellow river such as wei river and jing river. The result of training shows, when we choose a data set that position of longitude and altitude is close by the missing data, or we choose a data set in the same river, accuracy of prediction that using this model is good.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: An Analysis into the Evolution of Competition Forms of Clustered Enterprises
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Industrial Cluster; Life Cycle; Competition; Evolution
Abstract: Underpinning market operations in modern economy, competition is also the basic approach by which an enterprise survives and develops. However, how the enterprises within an industrial cluster (a special organization) compete against each other? Firstly this paper clarifies the relationship between industrial cluster and competition, i.e., moderate competition will promote healthy development of industrial cluster, while excessive competition will block or even destroy the development of industrial cluster. Next based on the life cycle of industrial cluster, this paper presents an analysis into the evolution of competition forms of clustered enterprises during different stages of such life cycle, and into the characteristics of evolving stages. The author embraces a hope to furnish researchers on competition of clustered enterprises with certain research foundation.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Research on the Comprehensive Evaluation of Small Town Sustainable Development Based on DEA
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Small Town; Comprehensive Evaluation; AHP; Data Envelopment Analysis
Abstract: On the basis of summarizing research for the index system of small town sustainable development, combine with the actual situation of the China's western region, the evaluation index system of small town sustainable development is built from the economy, society, resources & environment. On this basis, according to the indicators cohesion, non-parameter method used for evaluating the small town sustainable development is provided based on AHP method and DEA method. In addition, this model is applied to evaluate the sustainable development status of 23 subsidiary towns of Hohhot. The result shows that the sustainable development level of the small town in Hohhot is in the state of medium-weak, and the sustainable development level of over 50% towns doesn't reach the average sustainable development level of 23 towns of Hohhot in 2008. Through projection analysis, the towns with redundant economic development indicators are concentrated in the urban district of Hohhot; the towns with redundant social development indicators are concentrated in banners & counties of Hohhot. The local goverment needs to work out scientific and reasonable small town construction plan to cope with above problems.

Article Title: Research on the Product Quality Evaluation for Raw Coal Suppliers of Power Plants
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Raw Coal Suppliers; Product Quality Evaluation; Rough Sets; Fuzzy Sets
Abstract: By analyzing the product quality evaluation indexes for raw coal suppliers of power plants, and using the strong qualitative analysis ability of Rough Sets theory and its independent of the weight coefficient of all indexes, the paper evaluates the product quality for raw coal suppliers. Compared with the evaluation result obtained by the Fuzzy Sets theory, the evaluation result in this paper shows that the Rough Sets method can bring an obvious advantage for selecting and evaluating the best enterprise.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: An Empirical Study of the Influence of Regional Industry Structure on Innovation Performance
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Externalities; Specialization; Diversity; Market Structure; Regional Innovation Performance
Abstract: Based on the dynamic externality theory, this paper analyzes the impact of specialization, diversity of industrial structure and market structure on the regional innovation performance. This paper chooses the panel data of 5 high-tech industries from 2000 to 2005 to analyze. The result of empirical study shows that the specialization of regional industry structure is conducive to enhance the innovation performance. On the whole, the impact of diversity is very restricted, but competition make against innovation. Considering the unbalanced development of different areas, so we divide the sample of hi-tech industries into two groups including the core innovation areas and marinal areas by fuzzy dustering method for further empirical analysis. In the core innovation zone, the result shows the specialization and diversity of regional industry structure are both conducive to improve the innovation performance, but competition is not. In marinal areas, both of the specialization of regional industry structure and competition are conducive to enhance regional innovation performance, but the diversity of regional industry structure is not.

Author Keywords: Low Carbon Economy; Circular Economy; Mode of Economic Development
Abstract: With the global economic recovery, the word low carbon economy has penetrated to our life more. It has became the focus of Tianjin economic work in 2010 that transformation of the mode of economic development and efforts to build a low-carbon city and maintaining economic and social development sound and fast This paper analyzes the status and problems of low carbon economic development in Tianjin, and combines the mode of economic development and low carbon economy organically, and put forward strategies and recommendations for development which advance circulatory and efficiency of economy.

Article Title: The Research on Work Injury-related Insurance Operated by Intermediate Organization
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Work Injury Insurance; Intermediate Organizations; Returns
Abstract: At present,there have some practical problems which are need to be resolveed in the running course of China's industrial injury insurance. Among them, the most important issues that need by overcoming the government failure to resolve. To operate an enterprise is no doubt to overcome government failure as a viable approach, through the use of intermediate organizations approach to enterprise operation, can play the strengths of the government and enterprises, could operate work injury insurance better. In this article, will study the benefits of intermediate organizations operating industrial injury insurance, and give the proof of reasonableness.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Study on the Influence Factors of Regional Differences for Investment Efficiency in China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: The Efficiency of Investment; Influencing Factors; Panel Data
Abstract: This paper gives an empirical analysis on the differences and influence factors of the efficiency of investment by the panel data of 31 provinces from 1995 to 2007 in China. The results show that: from 1995 to 2007, the investment efficiency in the nation and the three parts of east, middle and west experienced declining process at first and then rising process, the eastern and middle regions had small differences in investment efficiency, but it had large differences from the western region. The development level of infrastructure, industrial structure, the market level can significantly improve the efficiency of investment, but the influence of government is negative.

Authors: Yang, J; Gu, YK; Tang, XL
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Yang Jie; Gu Yingkang; Tang Xiuli
Article Title: The Relationship between Festivalscape, Tourists' Emotion, Perceived Value and Behavioral Intentions
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Festivalscape; Emotion; Perceived Value; Behavioral Intentions
Abstract: The purpose of this study is to examine the interrelationship among festivalscape, tourists' emotion, perceived value and behavioral intentions. A survey is conducted in 2009 Shanghai International Tea Culture Festival and the model is tested by structural equation modeling. The results show that festivalscape is only positively associated with tourists' emotion, and also confirm that tourists' emotion is positively related to perceived value and behavioral intentions, and perceived value is positively related to behavioral intentions in the context of the festival tourism in China. This study contributes to the theoretical advancement in the field of festival marketing and also provides further insight for festival managers into better understanding of tourists' behavioral intentions.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Analysis on Development Strategy of Small/Medium Film Enterprise
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Small/Medium Film Enterprise; Strategy; Film Industry
Abstract: At present, there is a big disparity between small/medium film enterprises and large ones. Small/medium film enterprises are on the edges of market. How to improve the competency of small/medium film enterprises has much to do with the whole film industry. The paper analyzed four dynamic forces, and then, a sustainable development model including policy, technology, management level and capital operation is put forward. First, small/medium film enterprises should seize the opportunity which policy provided, and avoid risk. Second, they should learn advanced technology from large enterprises both from home and abroad and strengthen independent research and development efforts. Third, the system transformation from public undertakings to enterprises should be pay attention to by the state-owned small/medium film enterprises, and private ones should avoid patriarch-based management. Fourth, they all should strengthen cooperation with related departments in cultural industry and financial institutions to find more financing ways so that capital could push film industry to develop to a higher level.

Article Title: Multi-dimensional Scanning and Innovation of West China's Urbanization
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: West China's Urbanization; Development Outlook; Strategy Innovation
Abstract: The west China's urbanization process is obvious hysteretic with the appearance of a heavy pace under the shadowing of the west China's notable urban development achievements. This paper takes this as a background and analyzes the western urbanization's interruptive mechanism from the following four aspects: the development outlook, driving force, pattern and method, then through comparing the characteristic of western urbanization during the different historical periods, puts forward the main strategy that taking innovation as the dynamic engine, metropolitan region as the carrier etc., through which to guide the concrete practices of the contemporary west China's healthy urbanization.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: On the Reform Stages of China's S&T Management System
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: S&T system; China; Four Stages
Abstract: The characteristics of the four reform stages are analyzed, including the guideline, goal, key points, policy measures, context, important documents, existing problems and the achievements. The first stage is dominated by plan, with the guideline to put in force the principle of economic construction rely on science and technology and that scientific and technological work must be oriented to economic construction, laying the emphasis on the integration of S&T with economy. Experiments were made for departments and units' structure adjustment during the second stage, which was reoriented, and defined as facing the economy, rely on S&T to climb high mountains, aiming to establish a new system of science and technology management compatible with the socialist market economic system and the law of scientific and technological development. The reform guideline for the third stage was innovation, industrialization, the structure for S&T adjusted systematically. The guideline for the forth stage is indigenous innovation, aiming at building a more genuinely enterprise-centered innovation system, innovation should be the principal driving force for development in the coming decades. The evolving trend of the system reform is orientated to establish national innovation system (NIS) spontaneously or intentionally. That is to say, the deepening S&T system should be combined with establishing NIS.

Article Title: An Empirical Study: Factors of Influence of Word-of-Mouth
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Influence of WOM; Actively Sought; Perceived Risk; Self-Confidence
Abstract: With the rapid development of cyber economy, Word-of-Mouth has an increasing important influence on consumers' purchase decisions. As WOM is a consumer-dominated channel of information, its senders and receivers are thought to be independent of marketers. This paper selected 192 consumers who had experiences on online purchase as research object. Then it researched consumers' self-confidence, perceived risk, WOM actively sought and discussed the relationships between these factors and influence of WOM. The results show that consumers' self-confidence has a direct and positive effect on WOM actively sought. And perceived risk has a direct and positive effect on actively sought. Lastly, WOM actively sought has a direct and positive effect on influence of WOM. From the above conclusions, it is known that WOM actively sought is the key mediator in affecting influence of WOM.

Article Title: The Performance Analysis of Group Investment Cross Regions
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Group Investment; Regional Economy; Enterprises
Abstract: Group investment is an important mode of industry transfer, and in this process, some leading enterprises lead a group of upstream and downstream firms in related industries to transfer together. Comparing with the traditional industry transfer ways, its advantages are obvious: the transfer of the whole industry chain saves a lot of transaction cost for the firms concerned; besides, it will also play a positive role in forming industries with special potentials for the local economy. This article focuses on the performance evaluation of local economy and enterprises that involved.

Article Title: Dynamic Comparison and Management Measures of Real Estate Markets' Wealth Effect in Different Regions of China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Real Estate Market; Time-varying Parameter Model; Wealth Effect
Abstract: Through time-varying parameter model, this paper testes the dynamic variance of real estate markets' wealth effect in three different regions of China. The time-varying parameters model shows that East China, due to appreciation potential, attracts real estate developers and speculators, so the wealth effect is obviously higher and more stable. But Central China, affected by its own economic fundamentals, the wealth effect is not that stable. West China, due to the limited financing channels, is easily affected by the macroeconomic policies on the real estate market. In this paper, we suggest that state department should analyze different conditions and real estate markets in the three regions, and then take different but efficient measures to promote the development of real estate market in different regions, and stimulate local consumption. Meantime, it is also necessary to maintain the balance of commercial housing supply and demand to avoid the excessive growth of housing prices that may cause pricing bubbles.

Article Title: The Study of the Choice of Directed Technical Change under the Nonhomothetic Preferences Hypothesis
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Nonhomothetic Preferences; Skill-biased Technology; Labor Force Structure; Consumption Structure
Abstract: This article analyzes the demand-induced technical direction in developing countries under the hypothesis of nonhomothetic preferences. The developing countries face two directed technical changes, one is skill-biased and the other is unskill-biased. Changes in the structure of the social labor force or the social consumption or the rate of exogenous technical progress affect the profit gap between the two technologies. The basic conclusions are that, when the proportion of skills increases, the firm prefers the skill-biased technology; when the consumption structure is similar between different social classes, the firm prefers the skill-biased technology; when the rate of technical change increases, the firm prefers the unskill-biased technology satisfying some conditions. So if a country's income disparity is caused by the technical direction, we can narrow the income disparity by affecting the technical direction through changing the structure of the labor three, the consumption structure and the rate of exogenous technology progress.

Article Title: The Diversity of Appraisal Subject of Local Party and Government Leaders' Environmental Performance Evaluation
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Local Party and Government Leaders; Environmental Performance; Evaluation; Appraisal Subjects; Diversity
Abstract: The article analyzes the effect of subject diversity in the assessment of local leaders' environmental performance, such as building a harmonious society, and democracy, perfecting local party and Government leaders' environmental performance evaluation index system; and upgrading the role of the scientific assessment, etc; points out the singleness, dislocation and lack of independence in enforcer of the local leaders' environmental performance appraisal, the information asymmetry and lack of institutionalization in the appraisal enforcer selecting; proposes many measures that can improve local party and government leaders' environmental performance evaluation, such as: to set up a scientific structure of appraisal enforcer, to promote the independence of the appraisal body, to construct scientific and comprehensive information system, to improve the system of diverse evaluation enforcer involved in.

Article Title: Research on Urban Public Transport Improvement of Mainland China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Public Transportation; Transport Pattern; Bus Priority
Abstract: Urban public transportation is an important part of the construction of urban infrastructure, which is reflecting the city's all-round level of developments and modernization. The development of public transportation plays an important role in the construction and economic and social development of the city. There are still lots of problems and deficiencies in urban public transportation. By comparing various aspects of public transportation of developed countries and the Mainland cities, let us a better understanding of which needs to improve our country's public transport system. Finally, this paper proposed some advises of the development of urban public transport system in order to realize the bus priority and catch up with the developed countries as soon as possible.

Authors: Dai, TZ; Xu, XL; Wang, Y
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Dai Tianzhu; Xu Xianli; Wang Yan
Article Title: Financial Factor Analysis on the Pricing of Domestic IPO of the Growth Enterprise in China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: The Small and Medium Enterprise Board; IPO; Financial Factor
Abstract: This essay would analyze the IPO data of the start-ups listed in the SMEM of the Shenzhen to the Growth Enterprise Market (GEM) and the Small & Medium-Sized Enterprise Market (SMEM) Exchange by using factor analysis so as to find out the financial factors which deeply influenced the companies' IPO in the two markets. According to the pre-IPO financial data we would analyze the difference about financial characters of the two markets. In comparison with that of those listed in the SMEM, the pre-IPO financial situation of the companies listed in the GEM were better. From financing viewpoint, the companies listed in the SMEM focused on the profitability, operating and paying-debt capacity, while those listed in the GEM focused on the profit-growth capacity.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Cai Weimin; Yan Huayue; Shi Ying
Article Title: Research of the Basic Farmland Delimitation Based on Fuzzy Decision-making Model
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Basic Farmland; Fuzzy Decision; Index Construction; Delimiting
Abstract: At the present stage, basic farmland delimitation is lack of scientific and objective criteria, which causes strong subjectivity, such as delimiting the worse lands rather than the better ones, the farther lands rather than the nearer ones and the more separate lands rather than the masser ones. Therefore, we establish the index system and the fuzzy decision-making model based on the analyses of the characteristics of the basic farmland delimitation, which can reduce the man-made factors, providing the foundation for the intellectual, visual and scientific of the basic farmland delimitation and the theoretical evidence for arable land that can be selected in the basic farmland.

Article Title: Reconstruction of the Development Strategy of Hubei Tourism Industry Based on Value Innovation
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Value Innovation; Value Curve; Tourism Industry; Hubei
Abstract: Based on the concept of value innovation, this paper analyzes the existing strategic distribution of Hubei tourism industry and it's value curve. By eliminating, reducing, increasing and creating the corresponding tourism element, the value curve of Hubei tourism industry is reconstructed. On this basis, this paper proposes the new strategic layout and the corresponding strategies to develope Hubei tourism industry.

Authors: Gong, J; Yin, XZ; Wang, YF
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Gong Jun; Yin Xiuzhen; Wang Yufen
Article Title: Isolation, Identification of A Desulfurization Strain and Its Character in Acid Coal Mine Drainage Treatment
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Desulfovibrio Desulfuricans; 16SrDNA; Identification; Acid Coal Mine Drainage
Abstract: A strain sb-2 of SRB was isolated from the reflux sludge in secondary sedimentation tank of a sewage treatment plant. The strain was anaerobic. According to the analysis of physiological and biochemical measurements and its 16SrDNA gene sequence, the strain was identified with Desulfovibrio desulfuricans. The growth curve indicated that the lag phase of strain sb-2 was 8h and the logarithmic growth phase was 32h after which strain sb-2 entered stationary phase. The situation of acid coal mine drainage by strain sb-2 was studied. The results suggests that the SO42- removal rate is 62% and the Fe2+ and Mn2+ removal rate are 100% and 85.58% respectively in the unsealed treatment process of acid coal mine drainage by strain sb-2.

Article Title: Restraints Factors on Bioenergy Development
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Fossil Energy; Renewable Energy; Bioenergy
Abstract: With social and economic continuous development and constant population increase, the consumption and demands of energy rise continuously, meanwhile, the fossil energy with the mainstay of oil, gas, coal is encountered with depletion. Facing such serious energy crisis, to develop renewable energy including bioenergy is inevitable. In the paper, through the analysis of bioenergy development status quo, on the basis of investigation and reasonable thinking, main factors to restrain bioenergy development in our country are systematically researched, including such factors as the knowledge of bioenergy, materials, funds and technology to develop bioenergy, market, supporting policies, management systems and ecological problems of bioenergy.

Article Title: The Enterprise Ecological Planning Decision Model
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Enterprise Ecology; Enterprise Ecological Planning; Decision Model
Abstract: Enterprise ecology refers that during a certain period the input-output relations of enterprises constitute general status. The ecological planning is to establish the new scheme of organizational survival statue under the specific time and environment. The ecological planning is an ideological system, which includes P2-1 range, P2 brisk, P2-3 (investment and management) distribution. Based on the model of OK decision thinking, we build the enterprise ecological planning decision model. The purpose of the ecological planning is to promote organization in coordinated with the current environment, ensuring to realize the strategy, serving for the strategy.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Research on the Upgrading of Industrial Cluster Based on the Regional Networks in Zhejiang Province
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Industrial Cluster Upgrading; Regional Networks
Abstract: The industrial regions characterized by industrial clusters have become important market strength and have become the main body of economy in Zhejiang province. In our views, the competitiveness of enterprises based on industrial cluster, has been the competition in the industrial chain more than the products (services), therefore, the entry point for upgrading the cluster should not be confined to the lower manufacturing link of the industrial chain, and there should be the non-manufacturing links, which are the most valuable (such as product design, brand, the sharing key technology and marketing networks, etc.). Therefore, we try to find the key factors of the evolution of industrial clusters in zhejiang province from the origin of the industrial clusters' competitive advantages, which are four related networks including industry networks, innovation networks, social networks and financing networks, to find the better growing ways.

Article Title: Potential Analysis and Development Strategy of International Metropolis Construction in West China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: West China; International Metropolis; Potential; Integrative Strategy
Abstract: Analyzing the possibility of constructing international metropolises in relatively underdeveloped west China is a brand new topic in present research. Based on the analysis of the realistic needs of constructing international metropolises in west China, this article estimated the internationalizing potential of 10 municipal jurisdiction cities and central capital cities in west China and indicated that Chong Qing, Cheng Du and Xi'an are the 3 large cities with potential for development into international metropolises in the near future. The development strategy of international metropolises in west China has also been brought up in this article to instruct in the detailed practice of how to urbanize the western region successfully and to accelerate the theoretical innovation of urbanization model research in west China.

Article Title: Elements Analysis on Affecting Savings Deposits of Urban and Rural Residents Based on Factor Analysis
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Factor Analysis; Resident Deposit; The Principal Component Deposit Model; Relation
Abstract: An effective and simple parameter estimating method Factor Analysis method, for savings deposits of urban and rural residents model is proposed in this paper. As is known to all of us, there are many factors influencing savings deposits. The essential purpose of factor analysis is to describe, if possible, the covariance relationships among many variables in terms of a few underlying, but unobservable, random quantities called factors. This essay uses the method receiving two unrelated common factors which contain the whole information of five original elements. Therefore, we get the principal component deposit model. Through test, the new model could be proved to be accurate. Moreover the principal component deposit model has fairly good analysis result. In the end, this new model is applied to Chinese resident deposit forecasting based on the statistic data. From the comparison between new forecasting data and the statistic data, basing on the principal component analysis, we could conclude that the principal component deposit model is a quite effective and simple method for forecasting Resident Deposit.

Article Title: Empirical Study of Industrial Ecology Based on the Industrial Eco-efficiency
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Industrial Eco-efficiency; Industrial Ecology; Super-efficiency DEA
Abstract: The frequent extreme weathers have raised great concern of the people on the ecological environment problems. How to coordinate the relationship of the environment and development is the core for the existence of human. And the numerous contradictions of the environment and industries have promoted the birth of industrial ecology. The paper firstly introduces the relevant concepts and domestic and foreign study trends of the industrial ecology and its measuring indicator eco-efficiency, and then carries out the empirical study of the industrial eco-efficiency of Xuzhou with suer-efficiency DEA method, studying on the vertical change trend of the industrial eco-efficiency of Xuzhou from 1995 to 2008, horizontal comparison with Suzhou. The result indicates that the industrial eco-efficiency of Xuzhou has been obviously improved, but the overall industrial eco-efficiency is lower than Suzhou which develops fast in economic. At last offers the corresponding suggestions according to the result.

Article Title: Research on the Reuse of Household Garbage in Harbin Based on Recycle Economy Theory
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Recycle Economy; Household Garbage; Reuse
Abstract: At present, there are many problems in household garbage disposal in Harbin, such as unreasonable collection and transfer, low utilization rate of waste disposal site, unscientific management, imperfect waste recycling system, lack of funds and so on. Based on above problems, this thesis researched household garbage recycling, including circulation economy subject, circular, economy industrial chain and the whole society. Finally, the author suggest that people should advance circular economy within loop,circular economy industrial chain loop and general social circle, and try to make household garbage disposal harmlessness, reduction, reclamation, try to change government's single investment, let the main body of recycling economy produce a marked effect and form a circular economy industrial chain. So that all kinds of resources can flow into this loop, improve the utilization of resources and put minimize impact on the environment, alleviate the lack of resources and contradiction between resource demand and consumption caused by rapid economic developing and provide a reference for the reuse on building household garbage in Harbin.

Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Ecological Industry Cluster; Regional Economies; Poyang Lake; Sustainable Development
Abstract: From the Poyang Lake industry clusters are not economic, the obvious contradiction between environment and economic growth, low levels of economic development, leading industry chain is short and lowing level of regional networks phenomena, analyzing the development of circular economy based on industrial clusters to promote regional economic sustainable development, effectively enhancing the competitiveness of the region in Poyang Lake, reducing transaction costs of enterprise in the cluster, increasing the use efficiency of regional resources and regional innovation capability, enhancing the effective level of economic development in the Poyang Lake region.

Article Title: On the Optimization of Financial Statements
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Financial Statements; Historical Cost; Fair Value; Legal Evidence; Financial Analysis
Abstract: Historical cost and fair value information can be presented concurrently and respectively in one set of financial statements, providing comprehensive information to meet the needs of both the macro-economic regulation and the corporate business management. The key point of optimizing financial statement is to make clear the distinction between the legal truth and the financial expectation and the distinction between real economy and financial economy. The optimized financial statements could make the accounting procedures much easier by providing legal facts and current value separately and could improve the usefulness of financial statement as well. By thus, China could cope with the conflicts between domestic legal compliance and international accounting convergence with more flexibility.

Authors: Ma, ZX; Liu, Y; Ma, ZY
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Ma Zhanxin; Liu Yan; Ma Zhanying
Article Title: A Method for Evaluating the Whole Developing Level of China's Cities
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Comprehensive Evaluation; Data Envelopment Analysis; Multi-objective Decision Making; Indicator Integration; Complex System
Abstract: Data envelopment analysis is an important method of systematic analysis, especially fit for evaluation of complex system. But in practice, some shortcomings in DEA are hard to be conquered, which is mainly reflected in the following aspects. Sometimes, it is hard to determine input-output nature, evaluation results overemphasize the impacts of subsidiary indicators, most units are efficient in analysis results, and improvement of one index efficiency requires that all indexes be improved at the same time. However, by indicator integration, the improvement information of original indicators can not be found. To solve these problems, we propose sample DEA (Com-DEA) used for evaluation of complex system, then we also discuss the model meaning, model nature and model solution approach of Com-DEA based on the system analysis theory. Meanwhile, we evaluate the whole developing level of China's cities by applying this method in this paper. The application shows that com-DEA method not only has the advantages of traditional DEA but also conquers the shortcomings of the method by indicator integration.

Article Title: The Design of the Associated Monitoring Platform of Dangerous Chemicals Road Transport in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Shanghai
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Dangerous Chemicals; Transport; Combined Monitor; GPS
Abstract: In order to resolve multi-departments and inter-provincial supervision problems and achieve seamless monitoring in inter-provincial transport of dangerous chemicals, from the aspect of information sharing, joint sector and regional interaction, this paper advances the proposal of constructing the associated monitoring platform of Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Shanghai by the use of computer networks, RFID, GPS, GIS. This paper includes platform structure design, inter-provincial transport associated monitoring platform design as well as monitoring platform database design. This platform will enable the seamless, whole-process monitoring of the transport of dangerous chemicals, thus improve the operating efficiency of transport businesses and multi-departments and inter- provincial supervision efficiency.

Article Title: The Research on the Local Government Control System in Regional Innovation System
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Regional Innovation System; Technological Innovation; Local Government; Causality Relation Feedback Loops
Abstract: Local government is an important control element in the technological innovation system, we treat the local government as the control subject of the innovation system, establish the prediction of policy influence on the basis of structural analysis and control process, provide a better theoretical basis and operational method of research regional innovation system. It is necessary and feasibility for local government to intervene regional innovation. With the causality relation feedback loops and the design of input-output designing and functional module design of the innovation system, it can deeply reflect the internal development mechanisms of complex regional innovation systems, predictions can be made accordingly to reflect a more comprehensive macro, long-term system trends.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Distinguish of Influencing factors on Real Estate Price
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Real Estate; Price Increasing; Influencing Factor
Abstract: Real estate price fluctuation is an economic phenomenon, which affected by a lot of factors, such as investment preference, bank loan, macro policy and so on. But not all these factors should lead to the real estate price fluctuate, especially when the real estate price goes up constantly. Using the partial differential equation method, this article establishes the real estate price influencing factor model through expanding variables. The result in this paper indicates that real estate supply-demand relation, finance resource hold by the investors and price deviation are the major factors to affect real estate price level. By analysis of these variables, the price trend of real estate can be evaluated, and then the underlying causes of irrational real estate price inflation can be distinguished. That is to say the market anticipating of investors to real estate and bank credit blindness expanding are the deepen reasons causing irrational real. estate price increasing.

Authors: Wang, XZ; He, P; Zhang, LY
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Wang XinZheng; He Ping; Zhang Lianyang
Article Title: Application of RBF Neural Network in Cost Estimation of Construction Project
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Radial Basis Function; Neural Network; Cost Estimation
Abstract: Based on analysis of the factors that influence the cost of construction projects, the cost estimation model of radial basis function neural network was set up. The nearest neighbor-clustering algorithm was adopted to decide the width of radial basis function, the cluster centers chosen, and the weight values were calculated. The factors that influence the construction projects cost were used as the input data of the model, and the RBF neural network output the investment estimation. The predicted results show that the radial basis function neural network model has faster calculating speed and higher predicting accuracy, which can provide basis for cost Estimation for construction projects.

Article Title: Research on Exhibition Service Perception of Exhibitors in China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Exhibitor; Exhibition Service; Perception; Factor Analysis; One-way ANOVA
Abstract: This research is to identify the various needs of exhibitors encounter at an exhibition and measure what extent these needs should be delivered by exhibition organizers and Expo center as well as the related service institutes through the case of China International Industry Fair (CIIF) 2009. A total of 600 questionnaires were distributed at random during the exhibition with 519 completed and valid questionnaires returned. This research will provide a better understanding of Chinese exhibitors and exhibition service.

Article Title: Analysis of the Relationship between Opening Rate and Economic Growth -Based on Five Western Cities of Liaoning Province
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Degree of Opening up; Economic Growth; Panel Data
Abstract: Since reform and opening-up, there are significant effects on the economic construction and opening to the outside world in five cities in western Liaoning. However, there's still a great gap between the Five cities in western Liaoning and other cities in liaoning on GDP and degree of opening up. The research method of panel data analysis is employed in the paper. This paper analyzes the relationship between degree of opening up and economic growth in five cities in western Liaoning. The research shows that export plays a driving role to the economic growth, on the contrary, the import and FDI has no obvious positive effect to the economic growth.

Article Title: Does China Face a Housing Affordability Issue? Evidence from 35 Cities in China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Housing Affordability; Housing User Cost; Housing Price; Income
Abstract: This paper constructs upper bound of housing expenditure-to-income ratio on the basis of shelter poverty to conquer the caveats of current literature. The author estimates housing user cost in China to indicate the degree of housing affordability of cities in China. Descriptive analysis shows that generally speaking there exists no housing affordability issue in most cities in China. The empirical result of 35 large and medium cities in China from 1996 to 2007 indicates that housing price has played a more dominant role in housing affordability issue than income. In addition, house size also affects significantly housing affordability. Therefore the development of more affordable houses is an effective measurement to solve housing affordability for residents. It is also concluded from empirical result that housing affordability issue is decreased in the years of housing reform, the increasing ratio of population hasn't led to the difference of housing affordability in cities, housing affordability doesn't have significant different in different geographic location.

Article Title: The Empirical Analysis on Farmer's Consumption Effect Based on the Rural Public Goods Supplies
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Rural Public Goods Supplies; Cointegration Analysis; Error Correction Model; Effects
Abstract: Pointed to the two major factors, the supply of public goods in rural areas and farmers income,which affect rural consumption, this paper studies the long-run stable relationship between public goods in rural areas and farmers income by the use of cointegration analysis, and studies long-run effect and short-run effect of farmers consumer spending through error correction model. Then we compare the two effects.

Article Title: Analysis on Debt Financing of Real Estate Company Listed
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Real Estate Development Company Listed; Debt ratio; Debt Financing
Abstract: According to the statistical analysis on related financial data from real estate development companies publicly listed, we can find the debt financing situation as following: Average debt ratio of real estate. development companies publicly listed is higher than its whole industry and other industries. Financing sources which mainly include Bank Loan, Advance from clients and Accounts payable are similar. Internal factors as business model of development, financing model, profitability, company resources and external environment factors as financial policies, financial system are the fundamental reasons for that financing situation. The article further analyzed how debt impact on the profitability and external financial risks.

Article Title: South Pan-Asia Railway System and Balance Lines of International Freight and Incidentals
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: South Pan-Asia Railway; Freight and Incidentals; Balance Lines; Warping; Watershed
Abstract: The construction of south pan-Asia railway system makes the economic and trade transportation situation between Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) and China be faced enormous change. In new situation, the existence of dynamic balance lines of international freight and incidentals is an objective fact; there must be warping phenomenon in the cargo transportation line selecting which contradicts to the watershed function of balance lines of international freight and incidentals; warping phenomenon are caused by many inducing factors; balance lines of international freight and incidentals and warping phenomenon have much to do with integrate south pan-Asia railway cargo transportation convention. The extensive and unified Eurasia railway cargo transportation convention is not only the demand of the transportation between ASEAN and China, but also the demand of the transportation between eastern Asia and Western Europe. Although it needs much time, to bring into full play of the watershed function of balance line of international freight and incidentals should be a long-range objective, which deserves the countries of ASEAN and China to pursue.

Article Title: Analysis of Contribution Rate on Effect Factors of Regional Tourism Economic Growth: A Case of Shanxi Province
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Tourism Economic Growth; Contribution Rate; Factor; Shanxi Province
Abstract: With the continuous adjustment of industrial structure and economic growth pattern, tourism had become an important industry. By adopting methods of the correlation analysis and the regression analysis the article studies many factors of the tourism economic growth of Shanxi Province with the panel data. It was showed that: tourist component, tourist turnover, and exports were highly correlated on tourism economic growth and their contribution rates were the largest too. The contribution rate of per capita GDP was lowest. The other variables were no contribution.

Article Title: Study on Domestic SMEs Area Status Based on Co-word Analysis
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: SMEs Area; Co-word Analysis; Statistic Techniques; Visual Technique
Abstract: At present. thousands of scholars are committed to research on small and medium enterprises (SMEs), but different scholars may have different views due to the differences of the entry points, the focus points, the research methods, etc. Therefore, it is necessary to clarify the research status of the scholars', summarize the content & structure of domestic small and medium enterprises (SMEs) area, and predict the development trend for the later scholars to do further studies in the next research stage under such circumstances. For these reasons above, in this paper, we use co-word analysis method for 44 high-frequency keywords in 1025 academic theses about SMEs, which are published on the 30 core manage mental journals, through statistical and visual techniques, to study the current situation of domestic small and medium enterprises (SMEs) and to forecast its development trend, hoping to provide scholars a valuable reference for the next research stage.

Article Title: The Problem of Hebei Economic Development From the View of Human Capital
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Human Capital; Economic Development; Hebei Province
Abstract: The 21st century based on knowledge and human capital is the era of knowledge economy, human capital will give a great impetus to the economic development has become a consensus. Human capital investment and human capital accumulation has become the basic elements to ensure regional economic growth. On the base of analysis the concept and the function of human capital, using method to estimate schooling year, this paper studies human capital stock and quality of Hebei province in 2005-2008, and carry on demonstration study about its function on the economic development using the Cobb-Douglas production function. Finally, according to the situation of relative backward human capital stock and quality in Hebei province, which promotes economic development in poor effect, this paper gives corresponding policy recommendations on Hebei human capital development.

Authors: Zhao, XF; Wang, C; Miao, BQ
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Zhao Xiaofang; Wang Cheng; Miao Baiqi
Article Title: Unit Root Test in Panel Data Basing on the Limiting Spectral Distribution of Large-Dimensional Random Matrix
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Unit root test; Panel Data; Large-dimensional Random Matrix; Limiting Spectral Distribution
Abstract: With the development of Computer information technology, large-dimensional panel data models have been introduced into the econometric researches during the past three decades, in order to solve the more and more complex economic phenomenons. As we know, the one-dimensional time series has the across time feature, so the panel data does. Then, when we confront with the panel data, we must be sure it is stationary. That means we should test unit root before regressing in order to avoid spurious regression. This article provides a new unit root test method for panel data which is basing on the theory of the limiting spectral distribution of large-dimensional random matrix.

Article Title: The Suggestion from the Japanese Intra-country Economy as Eliminating the Gap between the Rural and Urban Areas
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: County Economy; Rural and Urban Development; Japan; Referential Experiences
Abstract: In the 1950s, with the accelerated process of industrialization, the Japanese government launched the industrial, fiscal, financial and many other agricultural policy measures to deal with the slow income growth of the fanners and the expansion of the rural-urban disparity. Japanese experience shows that the rural-urban disparity could possibly be eliminated by developing the county economy. In China's ovrall process of economic integration of urban and rural economy, it has great significance to learn from the Japanese experience to help solve the conflicts in the harmonious development of both the rural and the urban areas, promoting the scientific development of the country economy and solving the rural-urban disparity.

Authors: Zhong, JW; Zhang, XY; Song, GW
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Zhong Jinwen; Zhang Xiaoying; Song Guowen
Article Title: The Suggestions on Carbon Taxes Composition of Environmental Taxation System Innovation
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Carbon Tax; Carbon Emissions Reduction; Environmental Taxation System; Carbon Tariffs
Abstract: Foreign practice shows that negative impact of a carbon tax on economic growth is not large, and it can promote low carbon economic development. To introduce a carbon tax is imperative in China because it will help to reduce carbon emissions, transform economic development, improve the environmental tax system, deal with international carbon tariffs, and establish a responsible image. In order to design carbon tax system in China, some suggestions should be noticed: choosing a reasonable introduction opportunity, implementing a progressive carbon tax, perfecting the exemption clause, following the tax revenue neutral principle, forming the force of environmental economic policies.

Article Title: The New Energy Technologies, Urbanization and Low-carbon Economy
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Socio-technical Transitions; Technological Sharing; Urban Agglomeration
Abstract: This paper represents the research about the development of the renewable energy technologies and urbanization. The research makes an attempt to answer some emerging question: can the urbanization reshape the regional innovation of system? Dose the special spatial structure benefit the socio-technical transitions and the emerging renewable energy technologies sharing? The paper aims to conceptualize the role of urbanization within systemic technological transitions and sharing, and put forward some research propositions about low-carbon economy based on Chinese practice.

Article Title: Green Building: the Inevitable Direction for Chinese Real Estate Industry Development
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Green Building; Real Estate Industry Development; Sustainable Development
Abstract: China is a developing country with large population, per capita resources relatively scarce and fragile ecological environment. The economic development must take the road of sustainable development in the future. Currently, real estate industry development has not yet out of the development model which is featured by high resource consumption, high environmental impact and low production efficiency. Real estate industry shows a status of no sustainable development. How to deal with the conflict between resources shortage and real estate development becomes a most important issue. In order to maintain sustainable development for real estate industry, some countries have proposed the concept of green building in recent years. Green building can be achieved as a resource, economic and ecological sustainable development of real estate innovation model has been general concern. Government has an obligation to take the appropriate institutional arrangements and institutional supply to promote green building development. Green building is the inevitable direction for Chinese real estate industry development.

Article Title: Research on the Interactive Development Mode between Information Industry and Innovative City Based on SD Model
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Information Industry; Innovative City; Interactive Development; SD Model
Abstract: In order to research the relation between the information industry and the innovative city, this paper uses the method of the system dynamics, from both the theoretical and the empirical, has carried on the research on the interactive development mode between information industry and innovative city of China. In this paper, it has analyzed the spiral rise trend between the information industry and the innovative city and has established the system causes and effects chart. It also has studied the validity of the complex system which composed by the information industry and the innovative city using the information entropy theory. Finally, take Dalian city of China as an example, this paper empirical analysis the mutual impetus relations between the information industry and the innovative city, comes to the conclusion of the information industry and the innovative cities' SD model is effective. And the relation between the information-industry and the innovative city is not only interactive development but also show the trend of spiral rise.

Article Title: Search for the Core Network in Weighted Networks
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Complex network; Core network; Weight matrix; Eigenvalue; Algorithm
Abstract: In order to explore key nodes natures and find out the core of weighted networks, the study advanced Core Network (CN) conception, and developed Largest Eigenvalue Algorithm of Weight Matrix (LEAWM) for detecting CN, done empirical research for US Air Lines Network and Stocks Network of Real Estate Sector in China Stock Market. The empirical results indicate that LEAWM is feasible. CN consist of the key nodes with synthesis of some important properties such as bigger degree and betweenness, CN is the core of the entire network.

Abstract: In this paper, on the basis of the situation of urban land use, Constructed urban land use evaluation system from four levels that intensity of land investment, efficiency of land usage, economical benefits and sustainability. The article uses the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) to comprehensively evaluate the intensive land use in three regional cities in one province. As the lower evaluation cities of C2 and C3, they need to play the city's geographical advantages and develop a reasonable strategy for land intensive,

Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom

Abstract: Based on the overall understanding of the concepts of Low-carbon Economy and low-carbon city development, this paper has reviewed the experience and practice of the low-carbon development of cities at home and abroad. Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Loan Loss Allowances, Banking Regulation and Accounting Standard
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Loan Loss Allowance; Accounting Principle; Prudential Supervision; Accounting Principle of Prudence
Abstract: The regulatory rules of loan loss allowance have been controversial for a long time between the banking regulatory administration and accounting legislative administration. In particular, after the subprime crisis, whether the expected-loss model developed by the International Accounting Standards Board is an appropriate approach to resolve this dispute is in question. This paper examines the various arguments of the U.S. financial markets in the last two decades. We find that there is a deviation between generally accepted accounting principles and banking regulatory rules, which gives rise to the persistent debates regarding banking provision. Accordingly, the expected loss model is not useful either for accounting legislation or banking regulation. The fundamental solution is to strictly distinguish and improve them respectively.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Judge on the Coordinating Development of China's Urbanization and Industrialization in the Background of New Regions
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Judge; Urbanization; Industrialization; Coordinate
Abstract: The relationship of Urbanization and Industrialization has three conditions: the lower level of urbanization with the rapid industrialization, the compatible development of urbanization and industrialization, and faster urbanization relative to the level of industrialization. Every region of China shows different situation because the development of urbanization or industrialization is influenced by nature and policy factors. In the 21st century, China's urbanization and industrialization will enter the crucial phase, which accelerates to develop, but region difference is big. The important work in the future is working out appropriate strategy in order to promote the coordinating development of China's urbanization and industrialization according to the developing characteristic of every region.

Article Title: Study on the Disparities of Regional Economic Development in China
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Comprehensive Evaluation; Factor Analysis; Development
Abstract: The gap of regional development in China is growing, and the characteristics of each region varies widely. This article conducts Quantitative analysis on the characteristics and differences of each region's economic development with comprehensive multi-indicators, finds the common and difference of various regions' development from the data analysis results. The results indicate obviously that region economic development is non-equalization and non-coordination. This article gives some advice according to the advantages and disadvantages of different regions based on the comprehensive evaluation, supplies available information for self-development and coordinated development among all regions.

Abstract: This paper elaborated the importance of harmonious development of economy and environment in Chongqing northeast region. By the method of factor analysis with SPSS, this paper conducted the economy and environment condition of 11 counties in Chongqing northeast. This paper selected a total of 55 indicators. The research got scores of each county's environment and economy, and gave sonic suggestions to make sustainable development of environment, economy and society in Chongqing northeast region.

Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Article Title: Impact and Countermeasure of Industrial Optimization and Upgrade Strategy to Diversification of Agriculture
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Strategy for Regional Industry Structure Optimization; Agriculture Diversification; Impact; Countermeasure
Abstract: Diversification is the Characteristic of modern agriculture. The strategy for industrial optimization and upgrade will make a great influence on the development of multi-function agriculture in many aspects, indicate the direction and create conditions. This article focuses on a higher level and a wider field to integrate and collocate agricultural resources, and studies the specific influence of industrial optimization and upgrade strategy to multi-function agriculture. This article suggests that a new strategy of Chinese industrial upgrading and optimization will promote and develop the status, functions, contents, morphologies and service systems of the agriculture diversification and make the technical progress as a key power of the development of multifunctional agriculture from the aspects of three industries, agricultural restructuring, growing up of service industry and transforming economic development pattern. Based on this, it puts forward suggestions about speeding up the development of the agriculture diversification under the guidance of strategy of industrial upgrading and optimization.

Authors: Zhu, CH; Huang, FW; Jiang, AP
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Zhu Chunhui; Huang Fengwen; Jiang Aiping
Article Title: Research on the Influence of Low-carbon-oriented Economy on Chinese Economic Security
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Low-carbon; Economic Security; Countermeasure
Abstract: Chinese government has promised to reduce the carbon emission by 45% in next 10 years, and in order to achieve the goal of reducing emissions, we must give the priority to the development of low energy consumption industries, change the energy supply mode and adjust the economic structure. All of these will cause vital influence on Chinese entire economy, impact the immature economic and industrial structure and directly endanger Chinese economic security. On the basis of the research on the influence of low carbon economy on economic structure and the game analysis of the interests of different countries during this process, this paper constructively proposes the countermeasures on formulating policies and regulations fit for low carbon economy development, adjusting the industrial mode and structure, encouraging the independent innovation of low carbon technology and development of new energy and quickening the construction of Chinese carbon financial system.

Article Title: Optimal Model for Manufacturer's Multi-Products Supply-Production-Distribution Process Based on CVaR
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Manufacturer; Supply-production-distribution; Conditional Value at Risk (CVaR); Optimization
Abstract: This paper presents the optimization model of manufacturer's supply-production-distribution process with the conditional value at risk (CVaR). By our model, we may get the optimal strategy of materials purchasing and the optimal strategy of production in a business cycle. Numerical experiments show that our model can help manufacturers purchase appropriate quantities of raw materials from several suppliers, produce appropriate quantities of products, and then sell the products to several retailers with appropriate price, as well as the evasion of risk of the uncertainty of demand.

Authors: Li, CZ; Huo, Y; Jiang, XL
Book Editors: Zhang, S; Feng, Z; Zhao, H; Zhang, H
Author Full Names: Li Cuizhi; Huo Yan; Jiang Xiaoli
Article Title: Speeding up the Regional Economic and Industrial Development in Cooperation with Three Economic Circles-Research on the Development in Shanxi, Shaanxi and Inner Mongolia from the Perspective of Regional Economic Cooperation
Source Title: ADVANCES IN MANAGEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY, PT 1
Conference Title: 5th International Conference on Management of Technology
Conference Sponsor: Shanxi Assoc Risk Management,N Univ China,Shanxi Univ Finance & Econom
Author Keywords: Economic Circle; Regional Economy; Regional Economic Cooperation; The 3+3 Pattern
Abstract: Regional economy is the prominent supporting power of the economic development of every country and that of the whole world. As a dominant developing country, based on the strategy of developing coastal areas in 1980s and the large-scale development strategy for the central and western regions in the end of 1990s, China issued the policy of speeding up the transfer of industries away from eastern costal areas and towards central and western areas, which further enhances the depth and width of regional economy and plays an active role in promoting coordinate regional development. Promoted by the developing chance and guided by advantageous policies, this paper puts forward the tentative conception of the 3+3 Pattern the cooperation between the three provinces of Shanxi, Shaanxi and Inner Mongolia and China's three economic circles, and probes into the way of developing regional economic cooperation in accordance with the practical situation in this region. Meanwhile, the paper analyzes the approach of the pattern, proposes suggestions on policy and offers a flourishing long-term developing prospect.
